Create St. Edwards Support

Welcome to the Create St. Edwards support wiki. You'll find lots of information about the software and tools that support the Create St. Edwards project as well as information on how you can find out more.

Your Domain

You've got a lot of tools at your disposal with the Create St. Edwards project but maybe you're unsure where to start. We've got you covered with documentation on a variety of the tools you'll find in the control panel.

Wordpress

We have extensive documentation on Wordpress available to help assist you. Everything from publishing basics to installing new themes. You can view the full documentation here.
